block.field:
try:
 angle = float(input("Enter the angle in degrees: "))
 if angle < 0:
 print("Invalid angle (must be non-negative).")
 else:
 if angle > 360:
 angle = angle % 360 # normalize large angles
 if angle == 0:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Zero angle")
 elif angle > 0 and angle < 90:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Acute angle")
 elif angle == 90:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Right angle")
 elif angle > 90 and angle < 180:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Obtuse angle")
 elif angle == 180:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Straight angle")
 elif angle > 180 and angle < 360:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Reflex angle")
 elif angle == 360:
 print("Angle:", angle, "degrees")
 print("Type: Full rotation (complete angle)")
 else:
 print("Unknown angle type")
